verses.name: Ezekiel 31:1
verses.text: And it came to pass in the eleventh year, in the third month, in the first day of the month, that the word of the Lord came unto me, saying,

verses.name: Ezekiel 31:2
verses.text: Son of man, speak unto Pharaoh king of Egypt, and to his multitude; Whom art thou like in thy greatness?

verses.name: Ezekiel 31:3
verses.text: Behold, the Assyrian was a cedar in Lebanon with fair branches, and with a shadowing shroud, and of an high stature; and his top was among the thick boughs.
